incidents.title: DNS Modification
incidents.content: We are updating our DNS Configuration, which will make our blog unaccessible for some time. We are rolling out a new update for our blog.

incidents.title: Download links are no longer working
incidents.content:
Bitly has blocked several of our links to download our apps.

2022-04-27T16:07:17.928Z
Resolved

We have updated our links to our apps.

incidents.title: Xalyus Store cannot download any apps
incidents.content:
When downloading an application in Xalyus Store, the app crashes.

2022-02-18T11:19:40.769Z
Resolved

A fix for Xalyus Store is now rolling out to everyone. Thanks for your patience. Note that if cannot install it, we strongly recommand you reinstall Xalyus Store by downloading it again here.

2022-02-18T08:55:19.184Z
Monitoring

We found the cause of the issue and we are working on a fix. Howerver, it might get released later this day. You can use our website to download our apps if needed.
